description: This source file defines a React functional component named Sidebar, which serves as a UI component for a note organization application. It includes UI elements like SearchBar, NoteList, toggle buttons for archiving, and handles user interactions such as creating a new note, searching, and selecting notes.

methods.name: Sidebar({ notes, activeId, onSelect, onCreate, onSearch, search, showArchived, setShowArchived })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the sidebar UI with search, note list, and archive toggle functionality.
